projects.title: Ingestion / Export systems
projects.description: Create pipelines to collect data from clients, do machine learning process and return it to clients, supporting multiple formats. Project started from scratch, deployed to prod.
projects.results: New connectors where the client could easy / quickly onboard their clients

projects.title: AWS to GCP migration
projects.description: Create helm configurations and k8s configs to reduce aws usage and configuration costs

projects.title: Gamification
projects.description: Create backend infrastructure to track actions and give point based on events
projects.results: New functionalities to attract new user and retain old ones

projects.title: Platform
projects.description: Asset (e.g. video, thumbnails, closed captions, etc) ingestion and indexing
projects.results: Modernize the system, speeding up new integrations and rationalize data usage

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Working with bigdata, microservice, data science building chatbots

projects.title: Chatbots
projects.result: New product from scratch, a chatbot flow designer where big companies could trigger conversations (e.g. update addresses), automate FAQs, etc

jobs.title: Technical Lead
jobs.description: Tech Lead in a global app. Using Node/Groovy/Docker

projects.title: Feature Unlock
projects.description: Order placement/purchase system (orchestrator), created using event sourcing and integrating with legacy systems (e.g. mainframe, ftp)
projects.results: System created from scratch with modern technology enabling dealers to speed up sales
